snippet: Spain can’t continue using taxes to usurp the wealth of its richest regions. The time has come for Catalonia to secede.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Ricard Gonzalez and novelist Jaume Clotet argues that time has come for Spain's autonomous Catalonia region to fulfill its long-deferred dream of secession; contends that the region can no longer bear the weight of unfair taxation.

byline.original: By RICARD GONZÁLEZ and JAUME CLOTET

lead_paragraph: Spain can’t continue using taxes to usurp the wealth of its richest regions. The time has come for Catalonia to secede.

headline.seo: A New Call for Catalonia’s Independence
